title: Boy, 5, shoots sister, 8, in chest with BB gun
content:
It happened Friday afternoon in the Brumley Gap area of Washington County.
Sheriff Fred Newman told News 5 WCYB's Olivia Bailey the victim is an 8-year-old girl.
He said she was accidentally shot in the chest by her 5-year-old brother, and the pellet apparently penetrated her skin.
The girl was originally taken to Johnston Memorial Hospital in Abingdon, but was soon transferred to Niswonger Children's Hospital in Johnson City. Sheriff Newman says her injuries do not appear to be life-threatening.
